scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix client && npm install --prefix server
scripts.build: npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix client" "npm run build --prefix client" "npm run build --prefix server && npm run start --prefix server"
scripts.dev:server: concurrently "npm run build --prefix client" "npm run build --prefix server && npm run start --prefix server"
